long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View Youtube video thumbnails and download them! After youtube introduced autoplaying thumbnails, it has become difficult to view the actual thumbnail in full size. This extension lets you do exactly that.
1. Just copy the video's link,
2. click on the extension icon on the browser toolbar
3. paste the url. That's it!
